subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: Harvard won the 143rd Harvard-Yale Regatta, finishing the four-mile race on the Thames River in New London, Conn., in 18 minutes 54.1 seconds, less than eight seconds ahead of the Bulldogs.
snippet: Harvard won the 143rd Harvard-Yale Regatta, finishing the four-mile race on the Thames River in New London, Conn., in 18 minutes 54.1 seconds, less than eight seconds ahead of the Bulldogs.
